[Main Dimensions]

<br/>
*Terrain*<br/>
The ground terrain in dimensions is a flat plane. The plane is made up of a grid, everything on the plane is in one space on the grid. Only one player or monster can be on a grid space at the same time. Multiple peieces of treasure can be stacked in one grid space.
<br/>
<br/> 
*Combos*<br/>
The player has the ability to create a combo macro. This is just a list of abilities all tied to one button. When the player uses the combo (the same as using any other skill) the skills in the combo will happen sequentially.
